title: DevOps Portfolio
aboutText: I am a DevOps engineer passionate about automating deployments, building reliable cloud infrastructure, and optimizing CI/CD pipelines. I love working with Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, and AWS.
contactText: Reach out for DevOps consulting, collaboration, or freelance projects.
